title: Jet Ski
description: Jet Ski, designed for the ultimate aquatic experience! This high-quality asset comes with a skeleton mesh and is drivable.
longDescription:
Dive into the dynamic world of water with our Unreal Engine Jetski Asset Pack! This comprehensive pack includes a high-quality drivable jetski, complete with a powerful engine system, realistic sound effects, and stunning visual effects powered by Niagara.


Youtube Overview: https://youtu.be/Fagj5Ziafz4


The jetski itself takes center stage as the hero asset, featuring a skeleton mesh that enables the utilization of a steering wheel within the included animation blueprint. The jetski boasts a modest 12,000 triangles (12k tris) and is accompanied by a single material.

Included within this package are Base, Metallic, Normal Map, and Mask Texture options, providing flexibility for users to customize the jetski's color to their liking. Take advantage of these texture options within the material instance, allowing for seamless adjustments and ensuring that your jetski perfectly fits the aesthetic of your project.


The Blueprint combines everything, from physics-based driving on Unreal's water to controlling the jetski's color. It includes engine and wind sound design, changing the color of the jetski + VFX by pressing Tab. Lean in the direction of acceleration and braking, leaning left and right.


Update January 7, 2024: I added a custom Jet Ski AI that follows the player's pawn. It operates without a Nav Mesh and also incorporates buoyancy. Just select a BP_Jetski in your scene and set the 'Jet Ski Type' option to 'Follow Player AI'.


The Jet Ski was created by our talented artist: Stellan Jordans


Get support on Discord: https://discord.gg/tdtRCRGYqs


Important: This asset pack relies on the Epic Unreal Engine Water Plugin and is a mandatory requirement. We use this in the Showcase Map. Please activate the water plugin before adding the Jet Ski asset pack. The showcase map will not show up if you forget this!


Well-optimized and utilized in the game GG-Party with a download size of 30MB and an unpacked size of 72MB.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Jet Ski Skeleton Mesh.
  • Jet Ski Animation Blueprint.
  • Jet Ski Texture + Material + Material Instance for tweaking the color.
  • Blueprint: Jet Ski.
  • Jet Ski AI that follows the player's pawn
  • Blueprint: Floating Pylons (Replace it with your own meshes if you prefer).
  • Blueprints: GameMode, HUD and UI (Displaying the speed in km/h).
  • Showcase Map
  • Jet Ski Niagara VFX (increases by input)
  • Jet Ski Engine SFX (increases by input and with speed)
  • Jet Ski Wind SFX (volume increases with speed)
  • Showcase Map with the UE Water Plugin.

Number of Blueprints:

Input: Keyboard

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://youtu.be/nVM8_yRZOmU

Important/Additional Notes: This asset pack relies on the Epic Unreal Engine Water Plugin and is a mandatory requirement.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Follow AI for Jet Ski added.
